tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was referred to Dr Regina by my friend when I was looking for a good gynec to pursue treatment when I got pregnant.. Dr Regina guided us from the very beginning until now at every stage of pregnancy... And now I have a healthy baby boy... 

Thank you doctor for your guidance and treatment... She is definitely very experienced and checks all health hazards and take all tests required at every stage to avoid any kind of risks to mother and baby...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ***** **** ***** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ***** Thank you so much Dr.Regina for your care and guidance during this incredible experience! We are beyond thrilled. Truly happy for everything she did to help get our baby here. She was so wonderful to work with during a stressful time and her team was supportive and encouraging every step of the way. Thanks again for the difference you make in the lives of your patients! Her kindness and concern make everything better and is of great encouragement.The instructions given were clear, the tests done were authentic, and above all, the care provided was exemplary. Her clear communication fosters a trusting patient doctor relationship. She tries to understand and analyze the issue in a systematic way and the most important thing is she handles situations very calmly and never tries to complicate things and panic the patients. Appointments are easy to schedule and wait times are very minimal. The clinic is clean and organized. Dr. Regina provides accurate diagnosis and effective treatment plans, leading to positive outcomes. We cannot thank her enough for all the coaching and mentoring provided to us during the wonderful pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hello Everyone.
We are Kishore and Chaithra (Parents of baby boy)
I would like to share just one scenario that might give you a small Hint regarding the experience of Dr. Regina's
We had been for the last consultation(1 week before delivery) and Ma‚Äôm had informed us that normal delivery would be little difficult and Chaithra‚Äôs body is not favorable for one.
As Ma‚Äôm advised we got admitted on the next day to induce pain. Until 4:30 Chaithra did not feel any labour pain and hence Doc moved her OT and delivered a baby boy through C-section. After delivery when Ma‚Äôm explained the difficulty that she faced to complete the surgery due to the baby had rounded the chord twice around its neck.(This was never captured in any of the scannings) 
Doc literally had to push so hard (Normally delivering women would do :) :) ) and that could be next to impossible for a normal delivery to happen.
I‚Äôm really Thankful to Dr. Regina for taking the right decision at the right time.
After delivery she had come out calmly and said due to God‚Äôs grace we could do it. I actually strongly feel it‚Äôs due to Dr. Regina‚Äôs grace everything was normal.
There are lot of technicalities involved in this process and Trust me Dr. Regina is an amazing technician :) 
Just blindly follow what ever Ma‚Äôm says and she will take care of everything which I believe she will take the correct decisions.
This was my case but there are other two cases where Ma‚Äôm delivered a normal delivery. 1st one was the person who referred us to Dr. Regina and 2nd one(my sister) was whom I referred Dr. Regina to.

I would like to Thank Dr. Regina once again !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Regina is one of those rare doctors who ensures to keep a personal touch with her patients. Through every stage of my pregnancy, she explained the changes that happen to the body and always knew how to calm me down when I used to get concerned about a few things. She only does the mandatory scans and knows how to track the health and growth  of the baby by just listening to the baby‚Äôs heart beat and movements. She‚Äôs one of those rare doctors who promotes vaginal birth and tries her optimum best to ensure the patient has a vaginal birth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I‚Äôm thank full to God that I got to know DR Regina T Selvi,
If I can say she‚Äôs an angel whom I have seen ,it would never be wrong.I consulted Dr .Regina in Health today clinic , She was so kind , caring and admirable.The way she explains everything was amazing,we had too many complications from the first trimester,it was Dr Regina who took care and the medication was excellent. From day 1 until delivery she took care like a mother, anytime we could call the Doctor and get immediate assistance from her no matter what time it was. I‚Äôm recommending this doctor to my family and friends so far who ever has been there was very happy and thankful for getting to know DR.Regina.

Never have a second thought to visit Dr Regina, this period is very crucial in one‚Äôs life so make sure you reach the right doctor,,you will also get  the same experience as I got.

Another supportive person is Sister Kalyani from the Health today clinic , she was very helpful and made us feel that comfortable we never had a second thought to think about any other clinic.

From the bottom of my heart I would like to thank Dr Regina and Sister Kalyani for all their support.

After all treatment for Pcos we got pregnant by the month of Dec 8th and now we are blessed with Girl Baby bundle of joy for our family.

she put on her doctor‚Äôs green court and made her progress to the ward in midnight and just in another few mins‚Ä¶Dr.Regina delivered our little bundle of joy‚Ä¶at North Bangalore Hospital üôÇüôè

review:
You are an amazing Doctor and a wonderful person. Thank you for your support during some really tough times, as well as your encouragement to help me get to the best times in my life. I'm beyond thankful doctor. Words can't say how much I appreciate you but thank you so much for everything! You‚Äôre such a wonderful doctor and you always make me feel so safe. Thank you for being the best doctor. To me, you‚Äôre a magician, a great physician, a special gift from God. Thank you so much for all your contribution and efforts that you do to keep us well. I really admire all your dedication towards your work. Thanks for being an amazing doctor. I can never thank you enough for all your services. You are truly a women of honor and word. I will always pray to God for your betterment. Thank you for your tremendous skill in performing my operation on time and saving my baby. Jennifer & Alfred

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I don't have words to express my gratitude to Doctor Regina. Am blessed with a beautiful baby girl on December 8 2020. After struggling with infertility for long 7 years, I got pregnant while on her treatment. Through out the pregnancy and delivery, she has taken care of me like her own sister. Since I had a previous miscarriage, I was extremely nervous this time. She made me so comfortable and relaxed all the time. Whenever I demand for a scan to see baby heart beat, she does it with so much patience and made me relaxed. She is very humble and down to earth. Moreover understand patient's feelings and listen to their issues without any hurry. We can reach her on call anytime if there is any emergency. During all stages of my pregnancy, she has taken care extremely well. Unlike other doctors I have seen, she discuss every aspect of treatment with her patients and respect their opinion also before taking any decision. Also nurse, Kalyani sister is well experienced and has taken care of me extremely well. They both helped me to get my baby safely in my hands.

She was so patient enough and took care of me and my baby health so well.. Finally the day had arrived just like an angel she made our dreams come true... Best part and most unique thing which she seems very special is her attitude, down to earth  quality and always smiling and lots of positivity.. Everyone I reading out review I strongly recommend regina mam just trust her and follow her she will bless you with lots of happiness

I would recommend Dr. Regina to all the women in my life. She is kind and helpful. I went for a routine check up and you can tell she truly cares for all her patients. She is genuine and helped me understand how important it is to maintain good health. She even gave me a diet chart and explained everything to me in detail. I now follow it religiously and I can already see improvements. Her bright personality is also something worth mentioning. You feel a sense of comfort as soon as you walk into her clinic. She greets you with a wide smile and you can't help but feel safe. Thank you Dr. Regina!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Regina Selvi is a wonderful doctor. Very friendly, down to earth, she is someone who listens to her patients. The care we received from her was so warm, we were very comfortable with her in ALL our visits till our baby was Matteo was born. Through her planning we were able to conceived the baby. We thanked God for sending the right doctor to us. Dr Regina is the best doctor I have ever met so far and will continue to see her in future for my next pregnancy. She and her team made me feel at home at the operation theatre like a mother comforted her daughter. I love to recommend her to all my friends and family. She is the one if you are trying for pregnancy. *** ****** ***** ** *** **** ************** ‚ù§Ô∏è

With love, 
From 
Sunep, Sunoti & Matteo Longkumer.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
‚ÄåDr Regina is dedicated,Kind, Friendly , Patience and helping.I had been recommended to her as a trusted doctor and mine was a normal delivery assisted with forceps.i was admitted on Wednesday night and my normal delivery was on Thursday evening around 4.30 pm. Same day doctor had another 4 delivery cases to handle and yet she was determined that I will deliver normally and did not suggest for C section. I had lost hope due to hours of labor n baby head was not coming out and was going side ways.Yet she encouraged me and had patience to wait for normal delivery. She was allowed my husband to be with me in labor ward  that was sweet of her.
‚ÄåThank you Dr Regina and sister Kalyani for all your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a lot of problems delivering my first child with some other gynic . N dr regina was recommended by my friend n I visited her for some many problems starting from pcod to dnc. N during ny second pregnancy I dint trust any doc except for this one n flesh back to india just cos I was very comfortable wid her . She is an amazing person n very friendly . guides and answers all ur queries. U can approach her any time n she ll respond to u wid patience.  She understands her patients and calms them during surgery. She is never in a hurry. I delivered my son recently and very happy wid the entire experience. She really made me enjoy my pregnancy this time .
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had severe abdominal pain during and after the cycle past 3 years. Last 3 months the pain was unbearable. We were praying and asking God to help us. God directed us to Dr. Regina. She immediately understood the severity of my pain and diagnosed it as endometriosis and adviced me to undergo the hysterectomy. Explained about the disease and treatment required and side effects and post operation treatment. I was very scared and anxious. She comforted me and conducted the surgery which was a very complicated one. It was stage 4 endometriosis with bowel adhesion. Another important thing is that I could approach her for any doubts on the treatment over the phone through text or a phone call. She would definitely respond in times when we are unable to go and meet her in the clinic. Very understanding. We as a family would like to thank God for Dr. Regina. May God bless her and use her to help many more.

Dr.Regina is very kind, motivating, friendly and dedicated to the service that she is providing. I have delivered my second child normally through her guidance and support. I have known doctor for more than 7 years now. And completely trust her treatement  for various women related health issues. During first pregnancy I have been treated by her for first trimester health issues, Post pregnancy breast feeding issues. *** ** **** ****** **** * **** *** *** **** *********** ***** I highly recommend doctor Regina to all my friends and family and everyone feels the same with her. 
She has been a big support during my 2nd pregnancy throughout she guided to deliver normally. She does not recommended unwanted tests or medicines. She answers all our queries patiently. Thanks a ton to Dr. Regina and wish her all success.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My wife visited Dr Regina with PCOD/PCOS problem and missing periods. Problem got solved over a period of time and we wanted to have our first baby. Based on the advise and treatment we are now blessed with a baby boy. I would recommend Dr Regina for the way she treats her patients, the calmness and straight forward nature. She is very much approachable as she hears all our questions and then answers your questions with solutions.
Thanks again Dr Regina mam. God bless you with good health and happy life.
With Regards, 
Stanish & Patricia.

review:
Doctor is very friendly and she has positivity on her approach. 
Explanation on the problem is very nice and her treatment is satisfactory. 
Clinic is maintained in very hygienic way and staff is also very friendly. 
We can openly talk to doctor on the problem and get right treatment. 
During my pregnancy I was undergoing very bad mood swings, I spoke to doctor about this and her counciling was very helpful. She spoke to my husband as well on how mood swings affect the behavior and what support husband should give. This was really helped me a lot and I am very thankful for her support

review: We are so much thankful and gratitude to the Regina Ma'am, We are blessed with Baby girl last week, that to she made Normal Delivery to my wife having lowline Placenta. Regina Ma'am take utmost care and made normal delivery, during the pregnancy period also he cleared all your doubts even we ask for silly doubts also she replied with smile only. Kalyani nurse also very helpful during our pregnancy period and she respond to calls in odd time and very patiently tell the solution to the problem which we ask for. Thanks Regina Ma'am and Kalyani Nurse for all your support and care during this precious period in our life.

I would definitely suggest her.  ***** *** *****  Thanks a lot doctor

review: I am really blessed to find such a **** doctor who is very friendly,**** *** *** **** ****** *** explained the issue very clearly which given confidence for giving birth to a healthy baby. the treatment given was the bestI would say that we got the **** treatment with reasonable cost and the best part of the doctor is she will not charge/ suggest unnecessary treatment/tests/medicine.I had PCOD  problem where I was not getting conceived due to the problem where i got suggested for laparoscopy.Luckily and fortunately I got suggested to meet Dr Regina for the second opinion. After meeting the doctor she said it was not necessary and she clearly explained the issue and told it was not necessary. After starting treatment I got conceived with in 4 months.I had complicated pregnancy where I had bleeding in second month and also had low lying placenta where the delivery would be C section but I have given birth to a baby girl with normal delivery. During my complete pregnancy time  Dr Regina and Kalyani sister has given best treatment and taken good care of me. even they attended calls during Odd timings also in the mid night with patience and guided me the best.Thank you very much and I have no words to say how thankful to you for helping in giving birth to the beautiful baby girl.

I'm so thankful to Dr Regina for everything.

review:
This is our first pregnancy and we're so glad to have been in touch with Dr. Regina right from the initial days of pregnancy until the delivery.

At times of difficulties during week 32 (low AFI index), Dr. Regina raised the alarm at the right time and was open to all viable options available to us at the time.

Thankfully things went very well and my wife delivered a healthy baby at week 38. It was a normal delivery (NVD).

We're thankful to Dr. Regina for her patience, politeness and knowledge! She's a gift of God üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review: This is my second pregnancy. I have been seeing Dr. Regina since 2016 when i had a UTI. I have been seeing only her since then, including my both pregnancies. I had an issue with fluid levels the first time, so she had been carefully monitoring, taking precautionary steps this time since the beginning. Thanks to her, we caught the same issue early this time, and also was able to find out baby was having some issues, in time. I ended up having my baby a lil early at 34+5 weeks, but everything went well and NICU stay was only 3 days. She was there with us giving medical and emotional support right from start. Also, her clinic is very close to 3 major maternity and newborn hospitals. I would strongly recommend her, especially if you live in/or around the HRBR area in Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
I'm sharing my experience with Dr. Regina from past 9 months till the delivery of my little prince.
*She explained entire process of delivery.
* Time to time tests, based on test reports changed the medicines.
*Doctor available on phone 24/7 to help on emergency services and to clarify doubts.
* Prescribed low cost medicines and Tests.
* Talking with patients in very friendly manner and treat like a family.
* Doctor is comfortable to speak multiple languages.
* Main thing is she always prefer to do normal delivery.
* Hospital maintenance is very clean and hygiene. Staff members are very friendly.
* Doctor quick response and caring was amazing during the delivery.
* I highly recommend Dr. Regine.
* We fully satisified with her treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,Pregnancy Scan,Pregnancy care and management,
review: One of our friend recommended this doctor, with hesitation we had consulted her as this was my first pregnancy. But she was so polite, patient and she used clear all our doubts. I visited doc in May 2021, she explained about each and every scan. During my 7th month,my amniotic fluid became less... doctor helped me to take drips and liquids to increase it. Every check up she used to check on the fluid. During 9th month, she told baby is grown and it's time to induce pain and deliver the baby... I delivered baby boy on 30th Dec via c section. doctor explained us the emergency situation and got the baby delivered.. thank you very much Doctor

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had to wait 45 mins even though I had an appointment. When I did meet the doctor, she immediately diagnosed PCOS without asking for any test reports. She also looked down on me when I said I was sexually active before getting married. I had to insist on thyroid and hormonal tests to rule out other problems. When I came back the next day with test results, she again said it's PCOS since other test results were normal. I again had to insist on a pelvic exam to make sure it was uterine cysts. Very disappointing experience.
reply_text: Its the normal approach in reproductive age group to  rule out pregnancy . And to find out other causes for irregular periods and treat appropriately.

review: I came to doctor Regina for my health issues .I had a miscarriage previously now I came for the infertility treatment and got pregnant . Doctor Regina helped me to conceive and gave me assurence and support throughout my prenancy.so I  travelled the 9 months safely in her hands and delivered a female baby .I am so grateful to doctor Regina and sister kalyani for their support during pregnancy.

review: doctor is really simple and down to earth . I had gone for irregular menstruation. doctor explained in a simple with detailed  way. what is the need for life style modifications  in layman terms.that everyone could  understand. I recommend everyone to go to doctor for any gynaec problems.  the clinic is very clean and neat you feel more comfortable and sister kalyani also is friendly type. hats off to doctor Regina.
